tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE manufacturing_sop (
  sop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sop_name VARCHAR(255),
  sop_description TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE manufacturing_process (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  process_name VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE SOP_category (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(50),
  category_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SOP_document (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  doc_name VARCHAR(50),
  doc_description TEXT,
  category_id INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE SOP_revision (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  revision_number INT,
  revision_date TIMESTAMP,
  doc_id INT,
  created_by VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE procedure_steps (
    id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    procedure_id INT,
    step_order INT,
    description TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_procedure_id FOREIGN KEY (procedure_id) REFERENCES standard_operating_procedures(id)
);
